name: The Cradle of Strays - An Anthology
name_original: The Cradle of Strays - An Anthology
description:
A short story collection featuring 7 chapters of short stories and fanfiction about the concept of "home". Made during the Global Game Jam 2019. Since it was made in 2 days, the content is rough and unedited, but it is better to present things as is!

I wrote this while kinda depressed. Content Warnings are given before each chapter. Please read them, and take care of yourself, ok?
